Saradomin be with you,. We have a lot to be grateful to you for.
Thanks, but I'm not sure I feel the same way. I wasn't able to stop Lucien.
But you came very close and you lived to tell the tale. Lucien may have gained the upper hand, but he's not safe by any means.
He has people like you opposing him, not to mention an alliance between the Temple Knights, Crux Eqal and the Guardians of Armadyl!
You make a good point. Let's just hope it will be enough.
It will be, my friend.
Ah, it's good to see you again.
Hello there, Thaerisk. Any word on Lucien?
Nothing yet, but we're doing everything we can to find him. I hope he's ready for us, because once we do locate him, we're going to give him quite the bloody nose...
... or at least whatever passes for a nose on a Mahjarrat!
Hello there, friend. I heard what happened with Lucien and the Stone. Don't worry, he'll pay for his crimes sooner or later.
I hope you're right, Silif.
Have faith, friend. Evil never prospers for long.
I lost those robes I was using as a disguise.
Not to worry. I have them here for you.
Until next time, friend.
How are you enjoying your cell, Surok?
You let me out of here! This isn't over...
It's nice to see a little justice around here!
Good day, Proselyte. I heard from Akrisae what happened with that Lucien business. Be sure to keep your chin up. We'll get the old boy sooner or later.
Thanks, Tiffy.
Don't mention it, old bean. Now, is there anything I can do for you?
About Turael...
You need not share your condolences with me, adventurer. I've been prepared for this for a long time.
You have?
My brother was a thrill-seeker his whole life. Even after he retired, I always knew something would come and pull him back in.
And that something was me. I'm sorry...
Don't be. He died doing what he loved, and he died a hero. He wouldn't have had it any other way.
It's nothing personal, but I'd prefer not to discuss what happened with my father.
Of course. Sorry for bringing it up.
How are you, Harrallak?
I've lost two of my dear friends,. This old place doesn't seem to be the same since they're gone.
I feel responsible.
Nonsense, my friend! They both died bravely fighting against a great evil! There is no blame on you for that.
Remember them for who they were and what they stood for. Mourn their loss, but never bear the burden of their death, for that is not what they would want.
And what about vengeance?
Ah, now that is a topic we could debate for many moons, my friend. Still, regardless of the reason, know that when the time comes, I will fight beside you against Lucien once more.
Ah, hello there, warrior.
Why are you wielding a tree branch?
Well... there's a story to that. You see, I should have an axe but-
Sloane's axe?
My axe. He won it because of a squirrel.
A squirrel?
He bet me that I couldn't catch the squirrel while still holding my axe, but that he could... Thing is, he tricked me! When it was his turn, he just chopped the tree down!
I see. That doesn't explain why you have a tree branch though.
A barbarian warrior is bound to his axe. I cannot take up another, so I use part of the tree that Sloane cut down as my weapon... It also reminds me of him.
He was a great warrior.
Yes, and a good friend. Still, he would want us to be happy that he is now with his warrior brethren. Can I help you with anything else?
About Lucien...
He will be made to pay, my friend, and I assure you, when the day of his reckoning comes, I will be there.
So will I, Mazchna.
Then we will fight, side by side, my friend. We will fight in honour of Turael and Duradel, and we will see them avenged!
About Duradel...
Are you here with news on Lucien?
The moment you find him, you must come to me. I will ensure my father is avenged!
He wouldn't want you to get yourself killed as well!
I will not suffer the same fate as my father. I intend to be prepared. For a start, I have been researching my father's notes to find weaknesses in Lucien's demonic thralls.
Those sound interesting. May I see them?
Of course. If we expect to defeat Lucien, we must work together.
Return to me when you have space to carry them.
I will not suffer the same fate as my father. That fate is reserved for Lucien!
I hope you're right...
Speaking of those notes, I seem to have misplaced them. Do you happen to have another copy?
Luckily for you, I made many.
Hello there. What do you want to talk about?
Hi.
Hello there. I hear that Cyrisus is no longer with us.
He died fighting for a good cause. He'll be remembered as a great hero.
I suppose the good do die young.

characters.name: Achtryn
characters.description: Adult male demon, deep gravelly voice, professional and authoritative tone, a seasoned Slayer Master who speaks with confident formality.

characters.name: Akrisae
characters.description: Middle-aged male, British accent, devout and measured tone, a Saradominist priest and Temple Knight who speaks with religious conviction.

characters.name: Aya
characters.description: Adult female, British accent, direct and capable tone, a seasoned Slayer Master who speaks with professional authority.

characters.name: Balance Elemental
characters.description: Genderless elemental entity, ethereal multi-layered voice, calm and omniscient tone, speaks with cosmic detachment and mysterious foreknowledge.

characters.name: Betty
characters.description: Middle-aged female, warm British accent, friendly and approachable tone, a pleasant magic shop owner who is helpful and welcoming.

characters.name: Cave goblin
characters.description: Adult male goblin, high-pitched nasally voice, nervous and secretive tone, speaks quickly with occasional slip-ups when hiding information.

characters.name: Cyrisus
characters.description: Adult male, British accent, initially hesitant and anxious tone that grows confident, an adventurer overcoming his fears.

characters.name: Dark Squall
characters.description: Adult male, mysterious and commanding tone, speaks with calculated authority, a secretive mage leader who is actually Surok Magis in disguise.

characters.name: Darve
characters.description: Adult male, gruff and slow-witted tone, impatient and confrontational, a dim-witted warrior bodyguard who speaks in short blunt sentences.

characters.name: Druid
characters.description: Adult male, soft British accent, humble and subservient tone, a servant druid who speaks respectfully and formally.

characters.name: Duradel
characters.description: Middle-aged male, commanding and intense tone, speaks with dangerous authority and directness, an elite Slayer Master.

characters.name: Elite Black Knight
characters.description: Adult male, aggressive military tone, authoritative and suspicious, a disciplined soldier who barks orders.

characters.name: Ghommal
characters.description: Adult male, deep gruff voice, arrogant and challenging tone, a powerful warrior who only respects those who meet his standards.

characters.name: Guard
characters.description: Adult male, standard British accent, professional and alert tone, a dutiful soldier who speaks with military formality.

characters.name: Harrallak Menarous
characters.description: Middle-aged male, refined aristocratic accent, confident and somewhat aloof tone, a skilled guildmaster who speaks with elegant authority.

characters.name: Hazelmere
characters.description: Ancient male gnome, slow measured voice with mystical quality, wise and enigmatic tone, speaks in archaic formal manner befitting an ancient sage.

characters.name: Hunting expert
characters.description: Adult male, rugged outdoorsman accent, alert and practical tone, a skilled hunter who speaks with wilderness expertise.

characters.name: Idria
characters.description: Adult female, wise and authoritative tone, speaks with strategic intelligence and leadership, the commander of the Guardians of Armadyl.

characters.name: Ivy Sophista
characters.description: Adult female, statuesque and commanding presence, authoritative druidic tone, a high-status druidess who speaks with gravitas and conviction.

characters.name: Juna
characters.description: Ancient female serpent, slow ethereal voice with mystical resonance, contemplative and philosophical tone, speaks with ancient wisdom and slight melancholy.

characters.name: Khazard Barman
characters.description: Adult male, gruff working-class accent, guarded and businesslike tone, a bartender who is cautious about sharing information.

characters.name: Khazard Launderer
characters.description: Adult female, frustrated working-class accent, exasperated but friendly tone, speaks with the weariness of someone dealing with constant problems.

characters.name: Kuradal
characters.description: Adult female, fierce and determined tone, speaks with intensity and vengeful resolve, a dangerous Slayer Master seeking justice for her father.

characters.name: Lucien
characters.description: Ancient male Mahjarrat, deep commanding voice with supernatural menace, arrogant and manipulative tone, speaks with condescending authority.

characters.name: Mazchna
characters.description: Adult male demon, deep gravelly voice, intimidating and professional tone, a dangerous Slayer Master who speaks with dark authority.

characters.name: Movario
characters.description: Middle-aged male, intellectual and mysterious tone, speaks with scholarly precision and hidden cunning, an arcane scholar with dark secrets.

characters.name: Mysterious Voice
characters.description: Ethereal genderless voice, disembodied and questioning tone, speaks with confusion and curiosity about cosmic events.

characters.name: Oneiromancer
characters.description: Adult female, mystical and perceptive tone, speaks with confident wisdom and slight sardonic wit, a spiritual leader with telepathic abilities.

characters.name: Robert the Strong
characters.description: Adult male, commanding heroic voice, bold and tactical tone, a legendary warrior who speaks with battle-hardened authority.

characters.name: Sakirth
characters.description: Ancient male dragonkin, deep rumbling voice with reptilian undertones, wrathful and vengeful tone, speaks with ancient rage and menace.

characters.name: Shady stranger
characters.description: Adult male, evasive and nervous tone, speaks with false casualness while hiding suspicious intentions.

characters.name: Silif
characters.description: Adult male, measured and professional tone, speaks with respectful precision and good memory, a sharp-dressed Temple Knight operative.

characters.name: Sir Tiffy Cashien
characters.description: Elderly male, upper-class British accent, uses phrases like 'What Ho' and 'Don'tchaknow', cheerful and somewhat pompous tone befitting a noble knight.

characters.name: Sithaph
characters.description: Ancient male dragonkin, deep rumbling voice with reptilian undertones, volatile and authoritative tone, speaks with ancient fury and leadership.

characters.name: Sloane
characters.description: Adult male, confident and boastful tone, speaks with cocky humor and warrior's pride, enjoys telling stories of his exploits.

characters.name: Spectator
characters.description: Adult male, excited casual tone, speaks with enthusiasm and admiration, an impressed arena fan.

characters.name: Spria
characters.description: Adult female, friendly but dangerous tone, casual and no-nonsense manner, a capable Slayer Master with dry humor.

characters.name: Strisath
characters.description: Ancient male dragonkin, deep rumbling voice with reptilian undertones, philosophical yet wrathful tone, a former thinker turned vengeful creature.

characters.name: Surok Magis
characters.description: Adult male, grandiose and theatrical tone, arrogant and manipulative, a pompous wizard who proclaims himself the greatest mage ever.

characters.name: Suspicious outsider
characters.description: Adult male, defensive and dismissive tone, speaks curtly to avoid questions, clearly hiding something.

characters.name: Thaerisk
characters.description: Middle-aged male, calm authoritative tone, speaks with diplomatic weight and strategic thinking, a visionary druid leader.

characters.name: Turael
characters.description: Middle-aged male, patient instructional tone, speaks with professional authority and educational patience, an experienced Slayer Master.

characters.name: Yadech Strongarm
characters.description: Adult male, gruff warrior's voice, slightly bitter and resigned tone, speaks with the weariness of someone who lost a competition unfairly.
